name: Stray Souls Free. Mystical Hidden Object Game
name_original: Stray Souls Free. Mystical Hidden Object Game
description:
BRAND NEW MYSTERIOUS DETECTIVE GAME FOR FREE, ONE OF THE BEST IN GAME GENRES "HIDDEN OBJECT" AND "I FIND"!

Welcome to a town, abandoned by God, where pure evil runs free; where a desperate wife will risk her beating heart to find her beloved husband; and where a terrible secret lies buried behind an orphanage. Search for clues, solve puzzles and unlock new areas as you visit spine-chilling locations, play captivating mini-games and locate hidden objects.

Demons have conquered the town and turn him into a place where walls pulsate with evil, where the victims of a killer cry out for revenge and where a terrible secret is buried behind an orphanage. But that won't stop Danielle, who's determined to search every dark corner, brave every bloodcurdling sound and go places no human would want to go to complete her quest. Stray Souls: Dollhouse Story is more than a game; it's a heart-stopping journey of true darkness discovery!

Are you ready for really dark and creepy places, places without sun and light of hope? So welcome stranger, maybe you can bring a light of hope in this dark abandoned world and destroy dark witchcraft. Avoid numerous dangers, solve logical puzzles and smart minigames, seek and find unusual abilities and supernatural paranormal phenomena. Use your mind and get ready for logic games, magic, detective investigations, and too much search for hidden objects. Turn on your imagination, real exciting challenges still waiting for you, stranger!

THIS HIDDEN OBJECT DETECTIVE FINDING GAME FEATURES:

◇ 41 unique hand drawn locations and amazing designed levels to play!
◇ 12 chapters fulfill of true darkness!
◇ 7 unique mini-games and puzzles to solve!
◇ 21 best hidden object scenes
◇ In this game, you have your own assistant - an unusual toy from your husband's past.
◇ Hints to help if you get stranded!
◇ The strategy guide that helps you if you stuck in dark place!
◇ Tons of enchanted hidden objects to find, addicting quests, funny mini-games and logic puzzles to solve!
◇ Nice cutscenes and best hidden object gameplay!
◇ Equally suitable for teenagers, and adults
◇ Help you improve your concentration, perception, and focus, enhance your cognitive capacities
◇ Revise your vocabulary and train your memory
◇ Beautiful graphics and an unbelievable sound!
◇ Play on all kind of mobile phones or tablets
◇ No Wi-Fi or internet connection required - play where and when you want!
◇ Supported languages: English, Italian, Russian, German, French, Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Portuguese, Japanese, Spanish.

To all players, who plays only excellent hidden object puzzler games:
You can't miss this best detective thriller hidden object puzzle adventure!
Download "Stray Souls: Dollhouse Story" and enjoy this awesome game!

This fantastic hidden object quest game for girls and boys, teenagers, and adults, contains exciting various challenges, finding items, greatest detective storyline to investigate, cute characters and unusual and supernatural content. Please, welcome to enjoy this one of the best most beautiful, deepest, highest-quality, most epic hidden object searching game on your mobile device!

If you looking for “find the hidden object game for free”, please, welcome to download this perfect game!

Most beautiful, story-driven, highest-quality, most epic hidden object adventure game awaits you, stranger!

Play the best games from "Alawar", the makers of such games as Beholder, Farm Frenzy, The Treasures Of Montezuma, House of 1000 doors, on Google Play!
